General.Name: Shanghai Commercial & Savings Bank Ltd
General.Description: The Shanghai Commercial & Savings Bank, Ltd. provides various commercial banking services. The company provides time, savings, demand, checking, and negotiable certificate of deposit, as well as remittances; and corporate and personal finance. It also offers credit card, ATMs, and internet and mobile banking services. In addition, the company provides traveling, human resources, insurance broker, microfinance, leasing, real estate, nominee, trustee, commodity trading, property holding, IT application, securities brokerage, and property management services. Further, the company is involved in the purchase, evaluation, auction, and management of creditor's right of financial institutions; and investing in exchange fund bills and notes, and bonds. It operates domestic branches; foreign branches in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Singapore, and Wuxi China; and representative offices in Thailand, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Vietnam. The Shanghai Commercial & Savings Bank, Ltd. was founded in 1915 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 149, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10483
